channel.title: Injection on FelSec - Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Injection on FelSec - Blog

item.title: N1QL Injection - Part 1
item.description: Introduction Several months ago, I came across a N1QL injection vulnerability while testing an application. This was a vulnerability I had never come across before and although it was quite easy to understand and exploit, I was unable to find many resources covering it (one or two blog posts and a few CVEs). This series of blog posts will cover what I have been able to learn through my own research.
